system.description: The true wanderer, they are a bit like Amazons of the land. Always on the move and scouting about, rangers never like to have much responsibility if they can help it and prefer to be on their own. Gritty and worn like old leather, these characters are unflinching and realistic at all times. If you are playing a Ranger, keep watch, seek solitude, long for the woods and be introspective.

overview.base: Choose 3 species. Your damage is boosted against them. You can change your chosen species during a long rest.
overview.proficient: You may choose P additional species.
overview.fluent: You may instead choose F additional species.

overview.base: You gain Hibernation and Stamina.
All damage is deboosted against you.
You resist dropping due to being at negative MP. You still die when you reach half your maximum MP below zero and suffer other consequences from negative MP.
While down, you have Slow Regenerating.
Once every 10 minutes, roll you heal and regain that many HP. This does not consume the hit die. If you were dead, this brings you back to live with the number of HP you rolled.
While in the wilderness, you are always considered to have a mana storing (mana storing: 1) item on you. It stores and you can invoke with your hand to access it with Access Stored Mana.
overview.proficient: The wilderness is instead mana storing: P.
overview.fluent: The wilderness is instead mana storing: F.

overview.base: Pick a tradecraft and fluency relating to the moral of your story (subject to GM approval). All creatures that listened to your story in full gain that tradecraft and fluency for the duration of this ability.
